sentences.en: Common fractions written in the Greek or Egyptian system were too awkward for astronomical calculations.
sentences.cn: 用希腊人或埃及人那套办法写出来的普通分数很不便于作天文计算.

sentences.en: Egyptian law was in fact highly developed and extraordinarily efficient.
sentences.cn: 埃及的法制其实已经高度发达且行之有效.

sentences.en: Egyptian'mummies'can still be seen in our museums.
sentences.cn: 我们仍可在博物馆看到埃及的木乃伊.

sentences.en: Leaders from around the world eulogized the Egyptian president.
sentences.cn: 全世界的领导人都致悼词称颂那位埃及总统。

sentences.en: No Egyptian interest was served by the destruction of Israel.
sentences.cn: 摧毁以色列不见得对埃及有利.

sentences.en: Of the life and career of Moses, there is no Egyptian record at all.
sentences.cn: 关于摩西的生活和事迹, 埃及记录毫无记述.

sentences.en: Settlement would require ceding some Egyptian territory.
sentences.cn: 解决办法将要求埃及让出一些领土.

sentences.en: The Egyptian character of the masonry weighed upon me with its gloom.
sentences.cn: 那石头建筑具有埃及风格,阴森可怖,使我深感压抑.

sentences.en: The Egyptian pyramids indicate considerable mechanical skill as well as a stupendous mass effort.
sentences.cn: 埃及的金字塔花费了巨大的群众力量,也表现了相当高明的力学上的技巧.

sentences.en: The Egyptian was intoxicated and subdued by her grace even more than by her beauty.
sentences.cn: 她的优雅风度比她的美貌更使埃及人如醉如痴,五体投地.

sentences.en: The original fishing village of Rhacotis was the Egyptian district.
sentences.cn: 原来的小渔村雷可提斯现在是埃及人聚居区.

sentences.en: The Ptolemies respected Egyptian religion, and confirmed the priests in their positions.
sentences.cn: 他们非常尊重埃及人的宗教, 并确定了埃及祭司的地位.

sentences.en: The Syrian and Egyptian armies both suffered heavy setbacks.
sentences.cn: 叙利亚和埃及军队都遭受了严重的挫败.

sentences.en: To the Egyptian the Nile was his life's blood.
sentences.cn: 尼罗河是埃及人的生命源泉.

phrases.tran_cn: 古埃及雕刻、绘画与建筑等艺术

trans.tran_en: relating to Egypt or its people
